metadata.title: CVE-2016-10507 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow vulnerability in the bmp24toimage function in convertbmp.cin OpenJPEG before 2.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a craftedbmp file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
